instructions: For each sentence, list the restaurants mentioned in the Google review, or "none" if no restaurants are in the text.

examples.input: I ordered the Big Mac from McDonald's and it did not look like the picture in the advertisement!
Taco Bell has the best veggie burritos you can get for $2, what a steal.
Because this location is out of business, I would not recommend going to this Pizza Hut.
What a great experience we had at Chick-fil-A for our corporate event, the food was amazing and delivered on time.
This Burger King is a joke becuase they charge you for sauces... go to the McDonald's down the street.
The fries are great, and the Frostys are always a treat.
